content.text: I like to garden. It allows me to connect with nature and reminds me of my childhood.
I like listening to music while I work out to help me push myself.
What kind of music do you like?
I love acoustic music, especially when I am with my daughter.
I'm not too big on acoustic music, but I love to go to local fairs and try the food.
Oh, that sounds fun! Do you ever sell anything at the fairs?
I do! I sell miscellaneous stuff, like handmade jewelry, clothes, and purses.
That's so cool! I love going to the fairs and looking at all the different things people are selling.
Me too! I like seeing what people have come up with.
It's always interesting to see what people are creative enough to make.
I agree! I love the creativity of the people that are selling their stuff.
It makes going to the fairs so much more fun.
It really does! I always look forward to going to the fairs
